alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Licking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 03 at 7:04PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN FAIRFIELD AND LICKING COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM EST... At 704 PM EST, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Utica to near Pleasantville, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newark, Heath, Granville, Buckeye Lake, Hebron, Utica, Millersport, Pleasantville, Hanover, Harbor Hills, Granville South, Marne, Fairfield Beach, Thornport, Thurston, St. Louisville, Gratiot, US Route 62 at State Route 661, Purity and Brownsville. This includes I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 125 and 142, and near mile marker 144. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
